name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thumbnail remover for YouTube & YouTube Shorts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removing thumbnails helps you resist the urge to mindlessly click on videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thumbnail Remover for YouTube & YouTube Shorts: Stop Clickbait, Watch Less, Focus More

Thumbnail Remover for YouTube is the perfect tool to help you break free from endless scrolling and impulsive video clicks. 

By hiding YouTube thumbnails, this extension reduces your temptation to click on clickbait content, letting you focus on the videos that truly matter to you.

Key Benefits:

-Reduce Clickbait Temptation: Thumbnails are designed to grab your attention and lure you into watching unnecessary videos. By removing these visual triggers, you’ll have better control over your viewing habits.

-Reclaim Your Time: Without the distraction of thumbnails, you’ll be less likely to waste time on random videos. This extension helps you stick to your intended viewing, whether for entertainment or learning.

-Minimize Distractions: Stay focused on productive content. Hide distracting visuals, avoid mindless scrolling, and create a more mindful YouTube experience.

-Simple and Lightweight: The extension works in the background, blocking thumbnails on all YouTube pages without slowing down your browser.

-Improved Productivity: With fewer distractions, you can focus on what really matters—whether it's work, studies, or spending quality time offline.

Ideal for anyone looking to reduce screen time, boost productivity, and avoid the trap of YouTube’s algorithmic recommendations. Perfect for students, professionals, or anyone who wants to build healthier online habits.
